data.name: ShawnCena121
data.detailed_description:
ShawnCena121: The meme game..


Welcome to a 3d shooter, shoot other players to survive. The subway is has moving trains that will stop to no one! Watch out before you get hit with one causing you to die. Shoot other players to see how long you can last. Best tip is to hide behind the walls and crates for cover. Practice your aim as you fight against real people. Team with your friends for an advantage, go get friends and fight against the other players. Players will spawn randomly across the map, as you will be scattered. Pick a unique username to hop in with, to tell who your enemy or friend is. Create Rooms to play alone or with other players!

data.short_description: A 3d shooter strategy aim trainer game, using your scroll wheel will choose either your pistol or rifle. Using obstacles as cover avoiding trains and bullets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 112 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Graphics card is optional, isn't a big game.

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
